content.rendered:
It’s ugly. It’s an eyesore. It’s time to get rid of it.
If you are ready to get rid of your Chicago junk car, Aero Auto Parts is ready to take it off your hands. We will even pay cash for it on the spot and tow it away for you, free of charge. We are known as one of the top dealers in Chicago, but how do we obtain your junk cars?

Junk Car Annoyances

Junk cars can be a nuisance. They take up space in your driveway or garage or even your yard. You’ve been ignoring the giant, once-mobile problem, but now it is time to remove the junk car from your property.

What We Do

We have a salvage year dedicated to all the extensive auto parts and cars we have acquired. Aero Auto Parts gives you a fair deal for the junk car you want gone from your yard.

Hand Over Your Junk

Simple. First, you need to establish that the car is yours. Ownership is figured out through the vehicle’s title. Do not procrastinate—get the title, sell the junk car. Next, figure out how the car will end up with us. We have a pickup service! For free! We will come to get the car, pay you for it on the spot, and then haul it away. No gimmicks, no ruses. We are here to service you!
Selling your junk car shouldn’t be a headache. Chicago junk cars are our specialty at Aero Auto Parts. Contact us today for a free estimate or if you have any questions.
